name: Harvest Royale
description:
Harvest Royale is a mix between a farming sim and a battle royale game made for Ludum Dare 41. The theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

Unfortunately I ran out of time before adding more battle royale elements, so it's mostly a farming game.

How to Play:
- WASD or arrows to move
- 1,2,3,4 to select items
- Left Click to use selected item

- Collect Fruit
- Till the soil with your hoe (item 1)
- Water the ground with your watering can (item 2)
- Plant seeds you've collected (item 3)

- Survive the blight by farming and collecting enough fruit.
